title: Kuyil Pattu Lyrics En Rasavin Manasula
stanzas:
Kuyil paattu oh..
Vandhadhenna
Ila maane.
Adha kaettu
Selvadhenna
Manam thaane.

Indru vandha
Thunban ennavo.
Adhai kandu kandu
Nenjam pongavo ..

Kuyile po po
Ini naan thaane
Ini un raagam
Adhu en raagam.

Kuyil paattu oh..
Vandhadhenna
Ila maane.
Adha kaettu
Selvadhenna
Manam thaane.

Bakthi magam
Kondaada
Pithu manam
Thindaada.
Anbai ini nenjil
Sumappen oh ..

Puththam pudhu
Chendaagi
Meththai sugam
Undaaga
Aththanaiyum
Alli koduppen o hoho..

Vazhum aasaiyodu
Adhu vaasal thedudhe
Geetham paaduthe.
Vaasal thedudhe.

Kuyil paattu oh..
Vandhadhenna
Ila maane.
Adha kaettu
Selvadhenna
Manam thaane.

Indru vandha
Thunban ennavo.
Adhai kandu kandu
Nenjam pongavo ..

Kuyile po po
Ini naan thaane
Ini un raagam
Adhu en raagam.
